data.title: Forsyth–Edwards Notation
data.statement:
You will given a chess board where the position will be denotes as per Forsyth–Edwards Notation (FEN). 

In FEN notation, the rows are separated by slashes, the pieces are described using letters, and the number of consecutive empty squares within a row are noted using digits 1 through 8.


You have to print the  chess board with spaces in between two pieces. 

The empty spaces in the chess board is represented by {{O}}. 

There must be no trailing spaces. 

You shall see simpler and understandable graphical explanation of FEN here

{{https://www.chessgames.com/fenhelp.html}}

data.inputDescription: Single line containing the FEN of the chess board
data.outputDescription: 8 lines described as per the FEN for the chess board.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You will given a chess board where the position will be denotes as per Forsyth–Edwards Notation (FEN).

In FEN notation, the rows are separated by slashes, the pieces are described using letters, and the number of consecutive empty squares within a row are noted using digits 1 through 8.


You have to print the chess board with spaces in between two pieces.

The empty spaces in the chess board is represented by O.

There must be no trailing spaces.

You shall see simpler and understandable graphical explanation of FEN here

https://www.chessgames.com/fenhelp.html
Input
Single line containing the FEN of the chess board
Output
8 lines described as per the FEN for the chess board.
Constraints
Length of string < 71
Example
Input
rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR
Output
r n b q k b n r
p p p p p p p p
O O O O O O O O
O O O O O O O O
O O O O O O O O
O O O O O O O O
P P P P P P P P
R N B Q K B N R
